description: Try our easy to follow Lentil Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lentil Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place lentils into a small pan with thyme and garlic. Cover with water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 15-20 minutes or until tender. Drain and discard thyme and garlic.

Heat a chargrill pan over medium heat. Spray capsicum and halloumi with oil. Cook on both sides until capsicum is charred and softened and halloumi is golden and crisp. Slice capsicum and halloumi into strips.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar and mustard together, season with a little salt and fresh cracked pepper. Arrange all ingredients in a bowl. Drizzle with dressing.
